definition: to mix/to mingle/muddled/to drift along/to muddle along/to pass for/to get along with sb/thoughtless/reckless
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: You can get pre-releases, plus unique exclusive tracks and remixes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以預先發布，加上獨家收錄的歌曲和混音。

sentences.english: They just stick it over a dance beat and call it a remix.
sentences.chinese: 他們加入了舞蹈的拍子，說這個就是混音。

sentences.english: SzMix club DJ all is comes from all corners of the country.
sentences.chinese: 深圳混音俱樂部的DJ都是來自五湖四海。

sentences.english: This song I like in original and remix too.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡這首歌的原版和混音版。

sentences.english: It's one of our mix tapes. Remember we did the DJ intros ?
sentences.chinese: 我們的混音帶之一記得我們做的DJ介紹帶嗎？

sentences.english: This effects sound is often used in an effects mixer.
sentences.chinese: 這種效果音經常用於效果混音器。

sentences.english: Allen usually takes the lead in the sound mix and music at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 後期合成時通常還由艾倫監督混音和配樂。

sentences.english: This can really tighten up the tracks and add life to the mix.
sentences.chinese: 這就緊密地加強了音軌，增強了混音器的活力。

sentences.english: Have fun remixing your favorite songs and share remixes with your friends.
sentences.chinese: 玩得開心混音與您的朋友分享您最喜愛的歌曲和混音。

sentences.english: Have fun remixing your favorite songs and share remixes with your friends.
sentences.chinese: 玩得開心混音與您的朋友分享您最喜愛的歌曲和混音。

sentences.english: Dynamic processors can really help enhance a mix.
sentences.chinese: 壓縮器的確是能改善混音效果。

sentences.english: Volume level of the dry (no effect) send signal set in the mixer.
sentences.chinese: 在混音器中設定的無效果信號音量級別。

sentences.english: Then I went back to Mud, and remixed that one.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我回到泥，和混音，一個。

sentences.english: In 2004 a new remixed version of "Easy Lady" was released.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，一個新的混音版本易夫人被釋放。

definition: vocal accompaniment/to accompany a singer/to support of sb/to echo sb/to chime in with sb
sound track/track number (e.g. on a CD)
sung performance/to sing for an audience
album/record (music)/special collection of printed or broadcast material
